title: a11y.css
name: a11y.css
description: This file aims to warn front-end devs about mistakes and potential accessibility failures - but it also helps to rate client-side code and to spot its weaknesses.

scripts.docs: npm run docs:build && npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:prepare && npm run docs:deploy
scripts.docs:prepare: cp -r docs/Hologram/tests/* docs/build && rsync -avh docs/SassDoc/ docs/build && rm -rf docs/build/sass && rm -rf docs/build/js
scripts.docs:deploy: git add docs/build && git commit -m 'chore: compile documentation' --allow-empty && git push origin :gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix docs/build origin gh-pages && echo 'Documentation successfully deployed'
